item.description:
Our own Project Bread website


Join for this 20 mile fundraising walk and/or make a donation at the link above. Last year we had a lot of fun and raised over $2000 to feed hungry families.

RSVP'ing here is just the first step, you must register on our Project Bread website at the link above.

We will meet at 8am in front of the Tremont and Park Dunkin Donuts and will be finished by 4 or 5, based on last year's experience. Its a lot of walking, but you can do it! Or, if you really can't do the whole 20 miles, there are shuttle busses to get you back to the T.

projectbread.org/goto/meetup
item.name: Walk for Hunger
